attributes.action: get the companies holding the patent to technology that could hold the key to slowing down or stopping global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are companies that hold the patents to technologies that may be vital to slowing global warming but these companies will not give out these secrets because they will lose business(money) these companies are doing something very morally wrong these companies are sitting counting their money when soon people will lose their  land their homes and even thei lives.
